means: 无屈折变化的；无屈折的

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语当前虚拟语气是平原(uninflected) 动词的形式, 形式和一样光秃的不定式并且必要． 例如, 动词的当前虚拟语气形式认为简单.
the uninflected form of the verb ., 动词的非屈折变化形式.

means.word_mean: 3. expressing a grammatical category by using two or more words rather than inflection

auth_sentence.content: Throughout our discussion, his tone remained steady and uninflected.
auth_sentence.res_content: Throughout our discussion, his tone remained steady and uninflected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Throughout our discussion, his tone remained steady and uninflected.

auth_sentence.content: His words, delivered in his typically uninflected way, took a moment to register.
auth_sentence.res_content: His words, delivered in his typically uninflected way, took a moment to register.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His words, delivered in his typically uninflected way, took a moment to register.
